title: Need refunds
body: Hi riot i  wanted to know if i can get some extera refunds cuz my littel brother wasted them while i was away and he he just wasted them to see what happens so can i get some extera refunds

replies.body: Account sharing is not something we support, I'm not sure if we're able to assist with this beyond the 3 refund tokens available on an account.  Your best bet would be to hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and see if our account team can help with this.
